p: The samples were processed with the help of RT-PCR in real time in the National Influenza Laboratory Network all across the 32 states of the Mexican Republic. The samples with negative results for influenza in hospitalized and deceased patients were sent for the diagnosis of other respiratory viruses to the Institute of Epidemiological Diagnosis and Reference “Dr. Manuel Martinez Baez” (InDRE), recognized as the National Influenza Center in Mexico by the World Health Organization.
